TAO_Acceptor *    acceptor
)  [private]
 

Add the listen points in <acceptor> to the <listen_point_list> if this connection is in the same interface as that of the endpoints in the <acceptor>.

int TAO_SSLIOP_Transport::handle_input_i (  TAO_Resume_Handle &    rh,
ACE_Time_Value *    max_wait_time = 0,
int    block = 0
)  [virtual]
 

Overload of the handle_input_i () in the TAO_Transport class. This is required to set up the state guard. The thread-per-connection and wait on RW strategies call this handle_input_i ().
